verses.verse: Now the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> the firstborn<WH1060> of Israel<WH3478>, (for he was the firstborn<WH1060>; but, forasmuch as he defiled<WH2490> his father's<WH1> bed<WH3326>, his birthright<WH1062> was given<WH5414> unto the sons<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> the son<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>: and the genealogy is not to be reckoned<WH3187> after the birthright<WH1062>.
For Judah<WH3063> prevailed<WH1396> above his brethren<WH251>, and of him came the chief ruler<WH5057>; but the birthright<WH1062> was Joseph's<WH3130>:)
The sons<WH1121>, I say, of Reuben<WH7205> the firstborn<WH1060> of Israel<WH3478> were, Hanoch<WH2585>, and Pallu<WH6396>, Hezron<WH2696>, and Carmi<WH3756>.
The sons<WH1121> of Joel<WH3100>; Shemaiah<WH8098> his son<WH1121>, Gog<WH1463> his son<WH1121>, Shimei<WH8096> his son<WH1121>,
Micah<WH4318> his son<WH1121>, Reaia<WH7211> his son<WH1121>, Baal<WH1168> his son<WH1121>,
Beerah<WH880> his son<WH1121>, whom Tilgath-pilneser<WH8407> king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> carried away<WH1540> captive: he was prince<WH5387> of the Reubenites<WH7206>.
And his brethren<WH251> by their families<WH4940>, when the genealogy<WH3187> of their generations<WH8435> was reckoned<WH3187>, were the chief<WH7218>, Jeiel<WH3273>, and Zechariah<WH2148>,
And Bela<WH1106> the son<WH1121> of Azaz<WH5811>, the son<WH1121> of Shema<WH8087>, the son<WH1121> of Joel<WH3100>, who dwelt<WH3427> in Aroer<WH6177>, even unto Nebo<WH5015> and Baal-meon<WH1186>:

And eastward<WH4217> he inhabited<WH3427> unto the entering<WH935> in of the wilderness<WH4057> from the river<WH5104> Euphrates<WH6578>: because their cattle<WH4735> were multiplied<WH7235> in the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568>.

And in the days<WH3117> of Saul<WH7586> they made<WH6213> war<WH4421> with the Hagarites<WH1905>, who fell<WH5307> by their hand<WH3027>: and they dwelt<WH3427> in their tents<WH168> throughout<WH6440> all the east<WH4217> land of Gilead<WH1568>.
¶ And the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> dwelt<WH3427> over against them, in the land<WH776> of Bashan<WH1316> unto Salchah<WH5548>:
Joel<WH3100> the chief<WH7218>, and Shapham<WH8223> the next<WH4932>, and Jaanai<WH3285>, and Shaphat<WH8202> in Bashan<WH1316>.

And their brethren<WH251> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1> were, Michael<WH4317>, and Meshullam<WH4918>, and Sheba<WH7652>, and Jorai<WH3140>, and Jachan<WH3275>, and Zia<WH2127>, and Heber<WH5677>, seven<WH7651>.

These are the children<WH1121> of Abihail<WH32> the son<WH1121> of Huri<WH2359>, the son<WH1121> of Jaroah<WH3386>, the son<WH1121> of Gilead<WH1568>, the son<WH1121> of Michael<WH4317>, the son<WH1121> of Jeshishai<WH3454>, the son<WH1121> of Jahdo<WH3163>, the son<WH1121> of Buz<WH938>;
Ahi<WH277> the son<WH1121> of Abdiel<WH5661>, the son<WH1121> of Guni<WH1476>, chief<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>.
And they dwelt<WH3427> in Gilead<WH1568> in Bashan<WH1316>, and in her towns<WH1323>, and in all the suburbs<WH4054> of Sharon<WH8289>, upon their borders<WH8444>.
All these were reckoned by genealogies<WH3187> in the days<WH3117> of Jotham<WH3147> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, and in the days<WH3117> of Jeroboam<WH3379> king<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478>.

¶ The sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205>, and the Gadites<WH1425>, and half<WH2677> the tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519>, of valiant men<WH2428>, men<WH582> able to bear<WH5375> buckler<WH4043> and sword<WH2719>, and to shoot<WH1869> with bow<WH7198>, and skilful<WH3925> in war<WH4421>, were four<WH702> and forty<WH705> thousand<WH505> seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> and threescore<WH8346>, that went out<WH3318> to the war<WH6635>.
And they made<WH6213> war<WH4421> with the Hagarites<WH1905>, with Jetur<WH3195>, and Nephish<WH5305>, and Nodab<WH5114>.

And they were helped<WH5826> against them, and the Hagarites<WH1905> were delivered<WH5414> into their hand<WH3027>, and all that were with them: for they cried<WH2199> to God<WH430> in the battle<WH4421>, and he was intreated<WH6279> of them; because they put their trust<WH982> in him.

And they took away<WH7617> their cattle<WH4735>; of their camels<WH1581> fifty<WH2572> thousand<WH505>, and of sheep<WH6629> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> thousand<WH505>, and of asses<WH2543> two thousand<WH505>, and of men<WH120><WH5315> an hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505>.
For there fell<WH5307> down many<WH7227> slain<WH2491>, because the war<WH4421> was of God<WH430>. And they dwelt<WH3427> in their steads until the captivity<WH1473>.

¶ And the children<WH1121> of the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> dwelt<WH3427> in the land<WH776>: they increased<WH7235> from Bashan<WH1316> unto Baal-hermon<WH1179> and Senir<WH8149>, and unto mount<WH2022> Hermon<WH2768>.

And these were the heads<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>, even Epher<WH6081>, and Ishi<WH3469>, and Eliel<WH447>, and Azriel<WH5837>, and Jeremiah<WH3414>, and Hodaviah<WH1938>, and Jahdiel<WH3164>, mighty<WH1368> men<WH582> of valour<WH2428>, famous<WH8034> men<WH582>, and heads<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>.

¶ And they transgressed<WH4603> against the God<WH430> of their fathers<WH1>, and went a whoring<WH2181> after<WH310> the gods<WH430> of the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776>, whom God<WH430> destroyed<WH8045> before<WH6440> them.

And the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> stirred up<WH5782> the spirit<WH7307> of Pul<WH6322> king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804>, and the spirit<WH7307> of Tilgath-pilneser<WH8407> king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804>, and he carried them away<WH1540>, even the Reubenites<WH7206>, and the Gadites<WH1425>, and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519>, and brought<WH935> them unto Halah<WH2477>, and Habor<WH2249>, and Hara<WH2024>, and to the river<WH5104> Gozan<WH1470>, unto this day<WH3117>.
